citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 p.m. on
22-AUG-18.
I spoke with the person at the facility who indicated the owners were out of town and not available for an inspection.
